title: Single family home with detached studio– Grote Berg Curaçao
description: Bai Pe Real Estate proudly presents this move-in-ready modern family home located in the desirable neighborhood of Grote Berg, Curaçao. Situated on 715 m² of owned land, this property combines contemporary comfort, privacy, and strong investment potential — making it ideal for both personal living and income generation.

Designed for relaxed Caribbean living, the home features open, airy spaces, a private swimming pool, and a detached studio perfect for rental income, guests, or a home office. With its recent price reduction and turnkey condition, this property represents a rare opportunity in today’s market. Grote Berg is a quiet and well-connected residential area, offering easy access to Willemstad, major roads, and popular beaches. The neighborhood is known for its peaceful atmosphere and suitability for families and long-term living.
features: 2 modern bathrooms, including a spacious en-suite
Open-plan living and dining area with air-conditioning
Cooking island with pop-up charging station
Detached studio (ideal for rental income or guest house)
